Author: lisa_matsuki
Text: It’s taken me a long time to realize this, but you will get to your goal and avoid binging much better with a lower deficit. It’s hard to hear, I know. Like, this bitch wants me to go slower? But it’s much more helpful in preventing yo-yoing and can be positive for your body as a whole. Unless you’re exception to the rule short, you won’t gain weight by giving yourself a little more leeway. For me, even a calorie range really helps and might be something you could try?

Author: -Macaronis-
Text: Maybe try to high restrict? The weight loss is slower but maybe you won't binge that way.
